data.message: So if you block someone does it automatically un-friend them, sorry if this has been asked before don't want to scroll through 1000 comments.

replies.message: Hey Stephen. When you block someone it does remove them as a friend. Removing a block will not restore the friend connection. If you block a friend and then remove that person from your block list, you'll need to send them a new friend request. For more information on blocking someone, please visit our Help Center: https://www.facebook.com/help/131930530214371 -Hailey
Seems pointless... Why not just unfriend to start with?
So then you're not even tempted to look at their page.
I believe so until you unblock them.

The whole process is flawed if you ask me. Why take the long way around the pond when I can just cross it? If I "block" you I'm still going to have to re-friend you if I decided to be friendly again, so why not just un-friend to start with?
